abstract: Herman Cain has been picking up substantial support in recent national polls, but his lack of endorsements and perceived problems in Iowa cloud his chances of actually winning the nomination.
snippet: Herman Cain has been picking up substantial support in recent national polls, but his lack of endorsements and perceived problems in Iowa cloud his chances of actually winning the nomination.
lead_paragraph: Depending on how you slice the numbers, Herman Cain may now be leading, or tied for the lead, in polls of Republican primary voters.

headline.main: How to Know Whether Cain Is Able
